title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Bookstore          The Eastern National bookstore located in the site's ranger station carries a variety of educational items, including books, bilingual maps (French-English), music CDs, and more. Eastern National is a nonprofit agency that provides quality educational products and services to America’s national parks and other public trusts. Eastern National’s contributions have benefited parks and visitors by supporting research, educational, and interpretive projects. A portion of Eastern National's proceeds are returned to the park. The bookstore is open while the visitor center is open. Visit Operating Hours and Seasons for more information. You can also purchase a limited selection of items directly from the Eastern National website.
